title: Serif font — Edition Breitkopf
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162738im_/http:/typophile.com/files/qsdfg_6352.jpg)

Font: 

 Garamond 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162738/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content:
Garamond:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/garamond/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162738/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/garamond/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/garamond/")

The version that comes bundled with Microsoft Windows will do nicely.
